mapper.select: select a.room_no, count(*) as non_read_count from chat a join room b on (a.room_no=b.room_no) where b.member_id =#{memberId} and a.msg_time>b.check_time group by a.room_no

with getUserInfo as( SELECT a.nickname, a.profile_img, b.room_no FROM member a JOIN room b ON (a.member_id = b.member_id ) WHERE b.member_id IN ( SELECT member_id FROM room WHERE room_no IN ( SELECT room_no FROM room WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ) AND member_id NOT IN #{memberId} ) ), getroomNo as( SELECT content, room_no, msg_time FROM chat WHERE msg_time IN ( SELECT MAX(msg_time) FROM chat WHERE room_no IN ( SELECT room_no FROM room WHERE member_id = #{memberId} and moim_id=0 ) GROUP BY room_no ) ) SELECT c.nickname, c.room_no, c.profile_img, d.content, d.msg_time,nvl(null,0)check_in ,nvl(null,0)non_read_chat FROM getUserInfo c JOIN getroomNo d ON (c.room_no = d.room_no)

with getMoimInfo as( select moim_id, moim_img, moim_name from moim where moim_id in( SELECT room_no FROM room WHERE member_id = #{memberId} and moim_id=1 ) ), getRoomNo as( SELECT content, room_no, msg_time FROM chat WHERE msg_time IN ( SELECT MAX(msg_time) FROM chat WHERE room_no IN ( SELECT room_no FROM room WHERE member_id = #{memberId} ) GROUP BY room_no ) ) select a.content as content, a.msg_time, b.moim_name as nickname,room_no , b.moim_img as profile_img, nvl(null,0)check_in ,nvl(null,0)non_read_chat from getMoimInfo a join getRoomNo b on (a.room_no=b.moim_id)

select a.content, a.member_id, a.room_No, to_char(a.msg_time,'mi') as minute, to_char(a.msg_time,'HH24') as hour, b.NICKNAME, b.PROFILE_IMG from chat a join member b on (a.member_id=b.member_id) where room_no=#{roomNo} order by chat_id
mapper.insert: insert into chat( CHAT_ID, ROOM_NO, CONTENT, MEMBER_ID) values( CHAT_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{roomNo}, #{content}, #{memberId} )
